entries.title: Great fit, great price
entries.review: Worth buying this for value for money. But be warned: get one size larger as the medium is closer to small medium!

entries.title: Not worth the money
entries.review: Loose and poor stiching on the sides. Won't buy this again.

entries.title: Decent for the price
entries.review: I buy these often as they are good quality and value for money.

entries.title: Great little T
entries.review: Wore this to my local music festival - went down well.

entries.title: Great for the BBQ
entries.review: Bought this on the off chance it would work well with my skinny jeans, was a great decision. Would recommend.

entries.title: Nothing special but it's okay
entries.review: It's a t-shirt. What can I say, it does the job.
